Get up to 2.4% in RewardCash rebates
Get up to 6X RewardCash for spending in Rewards of Your Choice category. Rebate rate at 2.4% (ie HKD4.17 for 1 mile). Together with our new 'Red Hot Rewards of Your Choice Bonus Boost', you can earn up to an extra $3,000 RewardCash all year round! More about Red Hot Rewards

Easy QR code payments with $100 RewardCash rebate
Display the QR code or scan the merchant's QR code in the Reward+ app to complete transactions in mainland China, Hong Kong, Macau or anywhere that accepts UnionPay QR codes, without having to show the physical card—earn $100 RewardCash in rebates when you make 5 or more QR code payment transactions of HKD/RMB30 or more each; T&Cs apply

Additional benefits you can enjoy
One card, dual currency
Enjoy flexible payments in Hong Kong dollars and renminbi without worrying about exchange rate fluctuations.
Fabulous worldwide UnionPay offers
Enjoy dining, shopping and other fabulous offers with your HSBC UnionPay Dual Currency Credit Card all over the world! For details, please visit the UnionPay website

Activate your virtual card once your application has been approved
Once your application has been approved, you can activate your virtual card and add it to your digital wallets. Start shopping online and making mobile payments with your card right away for a faster, hassle-free experience!
Foreign currency transaction fee waiver
Save 1.95% in fees on every renminbi transaction.
Enjoy medical and travel assist services (Assist Services)
Need some help while you're in mainland China? We're just a call away. UnionPay's Assist Services—Emergency Medical Assistance and Emergency Travel Assistance—are ready to lend a hand.
